fullplot: A chronicle of the civil uprising against the regime of president Yanukovych that took place in Kiev (Ukraine) in the winter of 2013/14. The film follows the progress of the revolution: from peaceful rallies, half a million strong, in the Maidan square, to the bloody street battles between protesters and riot police.
plot: A look at the 2013 and 2014 civil unrest in the Ukrainian capital's central square.
title: Maidan
